   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Dec 16 18:57:47 2019.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to TrICal's documentation!
==================================
Trapped Ions Calculator (TrICal) is a python package for systems of trapped ions.

Installation
============
Clone the `TrICal github repository <https://github.com/QITI/TrICal.git>`_ using the following command,
::

    git clone https://github.com/QITI/TrICal.git

Contents
========

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   trical
